price: 27. Dan Dia mewariskan kepadamu tanah-tanah, rumah-rumah, dan harta benda mereka, dan (begitu pula) tanah yang belum kamu injak.*(676) Dan  Allah Mahakuasa terhadap segala sesuatu.
arabic: وَأَوۡرَثَكُمۡ أَرۡضَهُمۡ وَدِيَٰرَهُمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلَهُمۡ وَأَرۡضٗا لَّمۡ تَطَـُٔوهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا
footnotes: *676). Tanah-tanah yang akan dimasuki oleh tentara Islam.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-awrathakum arḍahum wadiyārahum wa-amwālahum wa-arḍan lam taṭaūhā wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīran
translations: And He caused you to inherit
